item.title: Can someone help me with this command [Advanced coders needed]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

I found this command but it’s not working…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("blinder")) { int Slot = GetItemSlot(36); if (Slot == -1) { sendMessage("You need a candle to use the blinder."); } else { deleteItem(36,getItemSlot(36),1); int range = 20; for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= range && person.playerId != playerId) { person.blinded = true; person.bTimer = 120; person.EntangleDelay = 120; } } } } } }

And under public boolean process() {
I’m supposed to add:

if (blinded) { bTimer -= 1; if (bTimer == 119) { sendMessage("You've been blinded!"); } if (bTimer <= 0) { blinded = false; setInterfaceWalkable(65535); sendMessage("You can see again."); } else { setInterfaceWalkable(13583); } }

But then when I compile it gives me errors.
I’ve tried adding in timers but I think im doing them wrong…

Anyone, please help

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with this command [Advanced coders needed]
